data.message: This is bull!! Mine still isn't working and I just updated my app 😡😡😡

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Lauren. We hear your frustrations and we're excited that you're interested in expressing yourself through Reactions. Please hang tight while our team rolls this out. Stay tuned! -Anna
Facebook so is it my account, then? Because it doesn't work on my computer either.. But my husband, who also uses Apple, has them

I've seen a lot of people saying the same thing. I've been trying to help people figure out how to get it to work since Facebook only seems to respond once. If I see anything about how you can fix this problem, I'll let you know.
Jessica Jean Koch oh thank you so much!!

Thanks for reaching out, Lauren. We hear your frustrations and we're excited that you're interested in expressing yourself through Reactions. Please hang tight while our team rolls this out. Stay tuned! -Anna
